meta.title: What's new in Vert.x 4.2
meta.summary: See an overview of all new and exciting features in Vert.x 4.2, including Java 17 support, Vert.x Oracle Client and more.

meta.title: Eclipse Vert.x 3.9.10 released!
meta.summary: Eclipse Vert.x version 3.9.10 has just been released. It fixes quite a few bugs that have been reported by the community.
